__e: Like all of us, the general has his good points, as well as his faults.
And I mean really think. What are you good at? What do you suck at?
The strengths and weaknesses of the houses that will either join or oppose you.
Now would be a good time to give my pride a boost and invite me in.
He's no more than a man but he's a man from another time, with great strengths, great powers.
- If she could just strengthen him and keep him from sinking further into death, we might be able to save him.
